thread.title: Kristen
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Kristen

author: Kristen
title: Kristen
text: The store in Woburn, MA always does a great job and the quality of their work is top notch. There is usually a bit of a wait, but I'd rather have that than have them do a bad job. Their tech. spent extra time getting my car aligned today since it hadn't been done in a while, and I felt an incredible difference in how it drives. I will continue to take my business to them.
